message:
I've been working on this (mostly) myself for quite a while. It's a lean online press office, where companies can post their latest press releases or news together with 140 character max titles, which will be listed on the main page by latest as well as by category.

The vision is to cut out the barrage of spam that feature journalists get in the mailboxes by offering them a portal (with RSS feeds) to access releases from (or at least be one of the options). On the other side of the coin, it's a way to get exposure for your company/brand/product and some SEO-fu with it.

It's not the prettiest of things yet and does have issues, but if I don't ship now, I might never.

Check it out http://www.bulletinburst.com

Also, there's a South African version - http://www.bulletinburst.co.za with a different design.

Suggestions page is here: http://www.bulletinburst.com/vote/suggestions.php
